subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Erin Phillips made a turnaround jumper with 1.5 seconds left that gave the host Indiana Fever a 74-72 win over the Liberty in the opener of the Eastern Conference semifinals.
snippet: Erin Phillips made a turnaround jumper with 1.5 seconds left that gave the host Indiana Fever a 74-72 win over the Liberty in the opener of the Eastern Conference semifinals.
